page.title: 14TRANSPORT
page.content: There are four roads in our block.The B1434 ,road 1, which runs from the A46 to Brigg,the a46,road 2, which runs from Lincoln to Grimsby,Nettleton Top road,road 3, which runs along the top of the Wolds from Normanby le Wold to Nettleton and Gatehouse Lane,road 4, which runs from Holton village to the A46. A traffic survey was carried out on all 4 roads at the same time and the results are as follows: Road Cars Tractors Lorries Bikes 1 46 0 4 5 2 80 0 18 2 3 4 1 1 0 4 8 1 0 1 This proves that the A46 is the busiest road in our block.
